name: STATION 71M3
description:
The lonely Space Station 71M3 has found itself rolling through a rip in space time. Help protect the ship by jumping through time periods, destroying enemies, avoiding solar flares, and collecting precious time cores. 

CONTROLS: 

LMB - Shoot

RMB - Claw (Use the claw to grab time cores)

Q/E - Switch Time Period

Art/Programming- Me! Jaden Stock/RoyalJudas

Sounds- Freesounds
